name: Hike Gurl
description:
Haike wants to climb the mountain to see the beautiful world from above. Get her to the top in recorded time!

Hike Gurl was conceived when I put in my notice to leave at my job, and it has been released the day I finish! Celebrate with me as I move into a new chapter in my life by playing the platformer I made in the time I had left.

CONTROLS - Keyboard

Left & Right Arrow - Move
Space - Jump

CONTROLS - Controller

D-Pad Left & Right + Left Analog - Mover
A - Jump

Everything by Jared Hahn

@element_105
